sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_77597_smart_scho.Loggedinuserdetail</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Loggedinuserdetail</name><script><![CDATA[var Loggedinuserdetail = Class.create();
Loggedinuserdetail.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	attendance_info: function() {
		var result = this.newItem ("result");
		var logged_user = gs.getUserID();
		gs.info("User name is: {0}", logged_user);
		var user_detail = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		user_detail.addQuery('sys_id', logged_user);
		user_detail.query();
		if (user_detail.next())
		{
// 			result.setAttribute("user", user_detail.sys_id);
// 			result.setAttribute("fname", user_detail.first_name);
// 			result.setAttribute("lname", user_detail.last_name);
			gs.info(user_detail.first_name);
		}
	
	},
	type: 'Loggedinuserdetail'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-28 08:35:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>f09b0be32f6154106a2711c82799b6ed</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loggedinuserdetail</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Smart School Record" source="x_77597_smart_scho">8392fa442f6510106a2711c82799b66b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Smart School Record">8392fa442f6510106a2711c82799b66b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f09b0be32f6154106a2711c82799b6ed</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-30 03:07:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
